publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2318 Mr Tom McCabe:Local Government Finance ( Scotland) Order 2005—That the Parliament agrees that the Local Government Finance ( Scotland) Order 2005 (SSI 2005/19) be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-2318 Mr Tom McCabe: Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2005—That the Parliament agrees that the Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2005 (SSI 2005/19) be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott
